name: Battle Choices
description:
It's time to answer the question everyone has wanted to know. "Who would win? Ten geese or a giant bear?".

Battle Choices is your chance to test the ultimate battle's, and find the victor to some of life's biggest hypotheticals!

Pirate's vs Grannies, Ballerina's vs Geese, there is every match up imaginable in the latest battle simulation to hit the stores!

Are you up to the challenge?

Battle Choices features:
-Who would win choices
-Plenty of geese
-Glorious battles!
